trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "ScrollViewer".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "ScrollViewer".

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor na enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> for <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, esse método retornará um ponteiro <see langword="this" />; caso contrário, esse método retornará <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> é entendido pelo usuário final como interativo ou como contribuindo para a estrutura lógica do controle no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent" /> is <see langword="null" />, this method returns <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent" /> é <see langword="null" />, esse método retorna <see langword="true" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: Value indicating whether control is can be scrolled in the horizontal direction.
trans-unit.target: Valor que indica se o controle é pode ser rolado em direção horizontal.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: A posição de rolagem horizontal como uma porcentagem da área total de conteúdo dentro do controle.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="S_OK" /> if successful, or an error value otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="S_OK" /> se for bem-sucedido, ou um erro de valor caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: O incremento horizontal específico para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The vertical increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: O incremento vertical específico para o controle.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: Percent scrolled horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Percentual rolado horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: Percent scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: Percentual rolado verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can scroll vertically; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle pode rolar verticalmente; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: A posição de rolagem vertical como uma porcentagem da área total de conteúdo dentro do controle.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="S_OK" /> if successful, or an error value otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="S_OK" /> se for bem-sucedido, ou um erro de valor caso contrário.
